reviews.review: While this is not the masterpiece that Black Panther was, it is the film we have been waiting 10 years for. Perfect mix of emotions throughout. Thanos was portrayed to the best I could imagine.
Waiting 10 years was worth it! The perfect balance of fun and emotion, Marvel movies just seem to be getting better and better!
Simply one of the best MCU movies i have ever seen

So this was both good and bad, but I’m giving it less than 2.5 stars because it leaves you hanging and hanging for over a year for part 2. This is cinematic suicide and brushes dangerously close to kiss of death. Without spoilers, the ending would be okay if I knew part 2 was right around the corner. Even Lord of the Rings knew better and had part 3 scheduled within a year. You cannot have marvel movies follow with leaving this massive string hanging. Personally, I’m a little mad at the ending and the poor, poor lack of post credit spoilers.

Have just come back from seeing this here in the UK. WOW! Plain and simple- WOW! It is your great summer action blockbuster. If you have not been watching the previous films this will confuse you. You MUST have seen previous films to be able to keep up, as it starts immediately with intense moments and rarely slows down for breathers. There will be those that dislike that, but if you are a fan of comics this is how you want it. Action with comedy thrown in to lighten the intensifying moments that this just keeps building. This movie delivers. It's worth the money. Go with friends and enjoy!
The ending credit gave me chills...
An incredible cinematic feat which delivers on all fronts.

Best Super Hero Movie ever!!!!! Number #1 movie I think of all time! Going to break records!! 11 out of 10 so freakin awesome!! Thanos best villain ever in any super hero movie!!! So bad ass!!! This movie was EPIC!!

10 years of development, 18 movies to this, the movie is amazing, the visual effect are incredible, hilarious with fresh and a little bít Shu jokes, but the movie didnt Have really much time to lét everybody shine, not really to blame, the ending is emotional and unexpected but it didnt bring much satisfaction and what audiences hoping.
The effects were pretty bad in some places, the ending was a cheap gimmick, and I left the theater disappointed.
